<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Book a Car">9b8d41f193a6ea1025f57b732bba1098</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>End date should be after Start date.</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
	if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
	return;
   }
   var startDate = new Date(g_form.getValue('start_date')); // Pega a Start Date selecionado pelo user 
   var endDate = new Date(g_form.getValue('end_date')); // Pega a End Date selecionado pelo user

   if(endDate.valueOf() < startDate.valueOf()) {
		g_form.addErrorMessage('End date should be after Start date.'); // Msg de erro
        g_form.clearValue('end_date'); //Limpa o valor
       return false;
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-07-06 15:17:01</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4e3b590a93ea2e1025f57b732bba10fe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>End date should be after Start date.</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Book a car" source="x_1792436_book_a_c">f1957de89366661025f57b732bba103a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Book a car">f1957de89366661025f57b732bba103a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_4e3b590a93ea2e1025f57b732bba10fe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-07-06 15:17:01</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
